column5: Any hints where I might be able to get a feed this afternoon? I hope to be launching with my bride & progeny out of Port Maitland this afternoon.

This probably doesn't help much now but for near future the have been getting them out lowbanks area lots to. Sorry I didn't see this earlier but hope you will get out again soon around 12 to 16 FOW minnows look for some weeds beds starting.
Thanks for the reply, it was too cold for my wife to go out so we did not go.

I was out on Sunday fihsing perch in the river mouth and got about 25 with a few jumbo's in the mix. Hard to say if they are in or are late or have left. The grand is pouring a huge amount of water uot so I think this is spreading the perch out more then most years.  Darren
